search_by_name.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_deleted) return; { emit([doc.pvt_type, doc.name ? doc.name : doc._id], {'id': doc._id, 'name': doc.name ? doc.name : doc._id}); } }

search_by_name_and_number.map: function(doc) {if (doc.pvt_deleted) return;if (doc.name) {emit([doc.pvt_type, doc.name], {'id': doc._id,'name': doc.name,'numbers': doc.numbers,});}if (doc.numbers) {for (var i in doc.numbers) {emit([doc.pvt_type, doc.numbers[i]], {'id': doc._id,'name': doc.name,'numbers': doc.numbers});}}}

search_by_number.map: function(doc) {if (doc.pvt_deleted) return;if (doc.numbers) {for (var i in doc.numbers) {emit([doc.pvt_type, doc.numbers[i]], {'id': doc._id,'name': doc.name,'numbers': doc.numbers});}}}
